tool_description: This API offer every MBB fan an easy way to stay on top of the latest data for all operations such as scores, stats, standings, and statistics.
name: Men's College Basketball (MBB)
title: Men's College Basketball (MBB)

api_list.name: MBB Team Schedule
MBB Team Roster
MBB Injuries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mens-college-basketball-mbb.p.rapidapi.com/injuries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mens-college-basketball-mbb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: MBB Team List

required_parameters.name: group
required_parameters.description: Group is 50 for Division-I, 51 for Division-II, 52 for Division-III

api_list.name: MBB Standings

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: Group is 50 for Division-I, 51 for Division-II, 52 for Division-III. Default: 50

api_list.name: MBB Conferences

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: Group is 50 for Division-I, 51 for Division-II, 52 for Division-III. default: 50

api_list.name: MBB Scoreboard

optional_parameters.name: seasontype
optional_parameters.description: Pre-Season: 1, Regular Season: 2, Postseason: 3, Off-season: 4. default: 1

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit on the number of results. Default 300

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: default: 50. Group is 50 for Division-I, 51 for Division-II, 52 for Division-III

api_list.name: MBB Schedule

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: default: 50. Group is 50 for Division-I, 51 for Division-II, 52 for Division-III

optional_parameters.name: seasontype
optional_parameters.description: Pre-Season: 1, Regular Season: 2, Postseason: 3, Off-season: 4. default: 2
